title: Use SAS and R together
text: can install development version sasr like : sasr currently rudimentary form, hard use saspy installed set . Feel free contribute adding issue pull request. Don’t SAS License? can still set saspy SAS OnDemand Academics.

what: Convert R table to SAS — r_to_sas
title: Convert R table to SAS — r_to_sas
text: Converts R table table current SAS session. Translation errors may occur.
